cctair

Class SetUp

  • java.lang.Object
    • cctair.SetUp

  • public class SetUp
extends java.lang.Object
    SetUp class to define and create airplanes, create and modify the flights, and display the menu for this program. Declare and initialize Airplanes and Flights.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SetUp() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAirPlane()
      Method that allow add Airplanes to the Airplane list of the Airline.
      void addFlight()
      Method that allow create Flight object and display Flights available.
      void addPilot()
      Method that allow create pilot object with rating and name.
      void addPlane()
      Method that allow set the Airplane to a Flight using the Scanner and Flight number.
      void menu()
      Method where is created the menu of options that are available on this program.
      void scheduleTime()
      Method to set FLight's departure and arrival Time.
      void showAirPlane()
      Method that allow display the Airline Airplanes.
      void showFlight()
      Method that show all the Flights created.
      void updateTime()
      Method to update arrival Time in case of a delay.It is necessary Flight number.
